samples.question: So for example, since and when cannot go together, right?
samples.transcript: So for example, you can say I started when. So I started learning English when I was three years old. Yeah. Yeah. Or like I have been, I have been studying English since. Yes, yeah. So yeah, just when would go with your past simple and since would go with your present perfect continuous. Yeah, so it is a common one I hear a bit.

samples.question: Do you think people are happy when they buy new things?
samples.transcript: I am not really sure I 100% agree with that because some people actually buy things because they want other things in their life to be fulfilled. For instance, I tend to want to buy something when I feel lonely, but when I meet my friends, I do not really feel like I want to buy that thing. So I think if they really enjoy the general shopping experience, they could, they could enjoy shopping. But if they want something else but they just cannot have it, they could just shop for that. Okay.

samples.question: Do you feel happy when you are buying new things personally?
samples.transcript: Oh, I actually do feel happy because, well, for me, I always use things for a really long time. For instance, I have a shirt that I wore when I was in, about middle school or elementary school. So I use things a really long time, so I do not get many opportunities to buy new things. So if I do get to buy new things, I am really happy. Okay.

samples.question: What do you think will make you feel happy in the future?

So it would be really nice and happy and assuring to know what I am good or bad at some things. Okay.

samples.question: So you said describe something that I did in my study or work that made me feel confident, right?
samples.transcript: So I am going, so since my major is English, I will talk about what made me feel confident when I was studying English. English. So when I was in middle school, I wanted to go to the major that I am studying now. So English was my major that I wanted to go since when I was a little. So I started studying English on my own at home. So it happened mostly in my room and I would watch a lot of, just a lot of English YouTube videos. Like if I would watch a game, a gaming channel, I would watch an English speaking person playing the game. Or if I would watch a short documentary about something I would like, I would watch it in English. And I also watched some TED Talks, which is also on YouTube, which is free. And I recorded myself speaking to myself in the mirror because, well, I did not have any foreign friends. I still do not, but I wish I had. And I also just talked to myself in English and I also read some English books out loud. So that is how I studied. And it made me feel confident because, well, the first few years I felt I was just going around and around. I did not know what I was doing or what I was doing well or was this even working because normally if you study English you go to an academy or, or hire a foreigner. But I studied English at home by myself and I did not have anyone to talk to so I recorded myself and just listened to it. So at first I was not really confident about it but when a few years passed I could see myself more and more. It okay we can stop Okay Excellent so far Actually we actually went far over the two minutes Your story is very interesting So in the real exam they would have cut you off at two minutes but that not a negative thing So don worry about it we are talking about confidence, what makes people feel confident.

samples.question: Why do you think so many people lack confidence nowadays?
samples.transcript: I think, I think, since I am Korean, I will speak in terms of, person living in Korea. I think people are really pushing the limits of younger generations because the older generations really worked hard to make Korea this really, rich and famous country. So they think that, oh, since we made this country, we built this country like this, the younger generation should work just as hard as we did. But the circumstances changed and there is more requirements to do to get a job or get a house. So, my generation, for example, feels they really lack skill even though they study really hard to get a home or a job. So I think it is a generational problem.
samples.transcript_original: I think, I think, uh, since I'm Korean, I'll speak in terms of, uh, person living in Korea. So they think that, oh, since we made this country, we built this country like this, uh, the younger generation should work just as hard as we did. But the circumstances changed and there's more requirements to do to get a job or get a house. So, uh, my generation, for example, feels they really lack skill even though they study really hard to get a home or a job. So I think it's a generational problem.

samples.question: Do you think that children of confident parents also become confident adults?
samples.transcript: I am actually a little debative about that question because, at one part I do think Parents being confident about themselves can affect children in a good way. But also, my parents are very confident. But personally, I think they are too confident in a way that affects other people. for instance, they could be a little too rude. So, I try to be a little more polite. So, sometimes I feel like I lack confidence because my parents are too confident. So I think there is two parts of that answer to that question. Okay.
samples.transcript_original: Um, I'm actually a little debative about that question because, uh, at one part I do think Parents being confident about themselves can affect children in a good way. samples.question: What could teachers do to make studying more interesting and to boost their students' confidence?
samples.transcript: Oh, I think, since Korea is having less and less kids and, you know, schools are getting more and more smaller students at one classes, I think teachers should focus on more of the students, students liking. Like how, what they like, how they feel when they are studying or what they are confident at. So maybe one-on-one teaching could be a good idea or maybe something like, getting to know the student more instead of making them study. So I think, self-knowing is very important to making the student confident. Because as I said earlier, I would feel confident if I would know myself better. Okay.

samples.question: How can a person become more confident in general?
samples.transcript: In general, I think, studying and doing a lot of things, getting over your boundaries could really help. Because, I said I am doing my part job, part-time job. So I teach adults how to speak English at a Saturday. And at first I wasn really confident about that I was really scared and you know anxious And so I had really a lot of debates of whether I should do this or maybe I should just stay at home But as I started doing it I knew that oh I can teach how to speak English really good to people So I felt really confident about myself So getting out of your confidence zone, your boundaries, I think it is important to try new stuff.
